#include<iostream>
#include<limits.h>
using namespace std;

long int abs(long int a){
	if(a >= 0)
		return a;
	else
		return (-1)*a; 
}
int main(){
	ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
	
	long int n,j,i,exp[20];
	
	cin>>n;
	long int height[n],dp[n];
	
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		cin>>height[i];
		
	exp[0] = 1;
	i = 0;
	while(exp[i] <= n){
		exp[i+1] = exp[i]*2;
		i++;
	}
	
	for(i=1;i<n;i++)
		dp[i] = INT_MAX;
	dp[0] = 0;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++){
		j = 0;
		while(i+exp[j] < n){
			if(dp[i+exp[j]] > dp[i]+abs(height[i+exp[j]]-height[i]))
				dp[i+exp[j]] = dp[i]+abs(height[i+exp[j]]-height[i]);
			j++;
		}
	}
	cout<<dp[n-1];
	
	return 0;
}
